entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
